articles.title: SJC denies bail for North Andover officer shot by colleague
articles.description:
Kelsey Fitzsimmons pointed a gun at a fellow officer as colleagues were attempting to serve her a restraining order in June, prosecutors say.

The post SJC denies bail for North Andover officer shot by colleague appeared first on Boston.com.
